code: import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import HorarioForm from'../horario/HorarioForm';import styles from'./NewHorario.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NewHorario(){const navigate=useNavigate();const createPost=async horario=>{horario.cost=0;horario.services=[];try{await fetch('http://localhost:3000/horarios',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(horario)});navigate('/horarios',{state:{message:'Projeto criado com sucesso!'}});}catch(error){console.error("Erro ao criar horário:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.newhorario_container,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Criar Hor\xE1rio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Crie seu hor\xE1rio para depois adicionar os servi\xE7os"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HorarioForm,{handleSubmit:createPost,btnText:"Criar Hor\xE1rio"})]});}export default NewHorario;
